body: Flashlight actually looks for requests at search/requests/$key, which should contain a doc with fields type, index, query. It puts a response at search/response/$key with the results. If you want to test by manually adding the keys, try putting the request under another node e.g. search/requests/testkey123.
title: Not able to do proper path monitoring or querying with Firebase and ElasticSearch (with Flashlight)
